Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface Rotatable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NodeProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContinuousRotatable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, RectangleEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
    public interface Rotatable
extends NodeProvider
    Implementing the interface Rotatable will result in de availability of the setRotate(double) method.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void setRotate​(double degrees)
      Set the rotation of the YaegerEntity to the specified value.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.NodeProvider

        getGameNode, toBack, toFront

    • Method Detail

      • setRotate

        default void setRotate​(double degrees)
        Set the rotation of the YaegerEntity to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        degrees - the rotation in degrees as a double
